item.title: VMware Horizon View Auto-Connection Utility
item.description: There is new useful utility on VMware Labs for VMware Horizon View administrators which helps them to connect the VMware View Client automatically into a View desktop or an application pool when the system starts up. This can be very useful for thin clients or for turning existing Windows endpoints into thin client systems used to automatically connect into a View desktop.
